content.description: A few flared hand jams lead to a deep offwidth.  One or two offwidth moves take you to easier moves and the top.
content.protection: Include one larger piece for the offwidth section.
content.location: This is 40 feet left of Savwafare Ist Everywhere.  It is a left-leaning "tube" with a finger and hand crack in the back.

content.description: This route features 3-star climbing on 2-star rock. It may clean up in time, but for now the route is a little chossy in places. It's quite steep and the pro is tricky at the crux. Very fun, with nice rest ledges. Walk off right.
content.protection: Up to #1 Camalot. Build an anchor with gear.
content.location: This route is located on the southwest-facing Savvy Dome, on the taller, righthand section of rock. It is about 8 feet to the left of Shame - a very thin 5.10c seam.

content.description: Follows a thin crack to a wide chimney with an offwidth on the left hand side.  The rock is suspect in many places.
content.protection: Small stuff for the bottom crack and a couple of wide cams for the top offwidth.
content.location:
About 20 feet to the right of

Savwafare Ist Everywhere

.
